name: InventorSoft
description:
Inventor Soft is young Ukrainian software development company which provides services for wide range of clients from small businesses to large enterprises. Inventor Soft is focused on offshore software development, custom programming and IT outsourcing. 
Our team of Software Experts is always ready to assist you achieve the best possible solution to a problem. We do not just develop the software, but we cater to the Need and that is why we have been able to create and maintain satisfied clients.
https://inventorsoft.co/
